texts: We need to see evidence about the vehicle and its seating capacity to process your application.
To prove that the vehicle has 9 or more seats, upload an image of ONE:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Vehicle's MOT certificate","Vehicle's CIF or COIF (Certificate of Initial Fitness Certificate)","Your insurance document","Another proof that shows the number of seats"]}
You can upload a maximum of 19 documents for this application.
